statements: UPDATE CropYieldForecasting SET sensor_id = 101, weather_condition = 'Rainy' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE CropYieldForecasting SET soil_nutrients = 'Rich in nitrogen', weather_condition = 'Sunny' WHERE sensor_id = 102;
UPDATE CropYieldForecasting SET weather_condition = 'Sunny', soil_nutrients = 'High' WHERE sensor_id = 123;
UPDATE CropYieldForecasting SET soil_nutrients = 'Medium', weather_condition = 'Rainy' WHERE id = 456;
UPDATE weather_data SET temperature = 25.5, humidity = 60.3 WHERE sensor_id = 1;
UPDATE soil_nutrients SET nitrogen = 0.8, potassium = 0.6, phosphorus = 0.4 WHERE nutrient_id = 2;
UPDATE weather_data SET temperature = 25.5, humidity = 65.2 WHERE sensor_id = 1;
UPDATE soil_nutrients SET nitrogen = 0.8, phosphorus = 0.6, calcium = 0.7 WHERE nutrient_id = 2;
UPDATE CropYieldData SET soil_nutrients = '{"nitrogen": 5.2, "phosphorus": 3.9, "potassium": 2.6}' WHERE crop_id = 'a5c522db-ef39-4e49-94b6-cf3fe9e6a0a5' AND date = '2022-10-15';
UPDATE WeatherData SET humidity = 65.3, temperature = 25.9, precipitation = 12.7 WHERE date = '2022-10-15';
UPDATE CropYieldData SET weather_conditions = '{"temperature": 25.5, "humidity": 70, "precipitation": 15.2}' WHERE crop_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE SoilNutrientsData SET nitrogen = 10.5, phosphorus = 5.7 WHERE date = '2022-08-15';
UPDATE weather_data SET temperature = 25.5, humidity = 70.2 WHERE weather_id = 1;
UPDATE soil_nutrients SET phosphorus = 3.7, potassium = 5.2 WHERE nutrient_id = 3;
UPDATE weather_data SET temperature = 30.5, humidity = 60.2 WHERE date = '2022-11-15';
UPDATE crop_yield SET yield_amount = 3500.75 WHERE crop_name = 'Corn' AND year = 2023;
UPDATE weather_data SET temperature = 28.5, humidity = 60.2 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE crop_data SET yield_prediction = 450.75, crop_name = 'Corn' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE weather_data SET temperature = 30, humidity = 70 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE sensor_data SET sensor_type = 'Temperature' WHERE sensor_id = 12345;
